item.title: Configuring to Fedora 17 Local Mirror of NITC
item.description: This will help you to configure your system to download packages from NITC fosscell fedora mirror. Login as root in your system and use the following command to create a file inside the folder /etc/yum.repos.d touch /etc/yum.repos.d/fosscellfedora Copy and paste the folowing code into the created file using your favourite editor. ## Nitc fosscell fedora local mirror for fedora 17 and 18 [NITCFedora-updates] name=Fedora $releasever - $basearch - Updates failovermethod=priority baseurl=http://fosscell.
